bdy.p:
The Chinese national women's ice hockey team is controlled by the Chinese Ice Hockey Association. The
People's Republic of China is ranked 7th in the world. China reached their hey day of women's hockey in the mid-90's when it was common for them to finish in 4th place mostly thanks to the "Great Wall of China" goaltender, Guo Hong, who is now retired. China has 142 female players ( 2008). The head coach is
Steve Carlyle .

Ice hockey at the Asian Winter Games
* 1996 - Won Gold Medal
1999 - Won Gold Medal
2003 - Won Bronze Medal
2007
- Won Bronze Medal

IIHF Pacific Women's Hockey Championship
* 1995 - Won Bronze Medal
1996 - Won Bronze Medal
